block.p: BRIANT-Fredda (nee Smith). Of Guttenberg, NJ on Sunday Sept 10, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Walter. Devoted mother of Rosalie Hill. Loving grandmother of Peter Lahm. Visitation will be on Friday Sept 15, 9am-10am with a service beginning at 10am, at the Vainieri Funeral Home, 5923 Kennedy Blvd (Corner of 60th St.), North Bergen, NJ. Interment Ferncliff Cemetery, Hartsdale, NY.
